self = <TestCase.Recommendedstock.test_recommend_getlist.Testgetlist object at 0x0000016C2E64B7C0>

    def test_recommend_getlist(self):
        url = http+":1216/api/con_stock_recommend/v1/get_list"
    
        payload1 = {
            "id": 360,
            "sort": "1",
            "currentPage": 1,
            "pageSize": 20
        }
    
        payload = json.dumps(dict(payload1))
    
        head = {}
        head.update(console_JSON)
        token1 = {"token": getConsoleLogin_token()}
        head.update(token1)
        headers = head
    
        response = requests.request("POST", url, headers=headers, data=payload)
    
        r = response.json()
        print(r)
        assert response.status_code == 200
        if r.get("code") == "000000":
            assert r.get("msg") == "ok"
>           assert r.get("data") == True
